{"id":1367297635,"question_id":3555,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"3 months, 1 week","timestamp":1724553687,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/1367297635/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Final Array State After K Multiplication Operations I","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    vector<int> getFinalState(vector<int>& nums, int k, int multiplier) {\n        priority_queue<pair<int, int>> pq;\n        int N = (int)nums.size();\n        for (int i=0; i<N; i++)\n            pq.push({-nums[i], i});\n            \n        while (k--) {\n            pair<int, int> x = pq.top();\n            pq.pop();\n            pq.push({x.first * multiplier, x.second});\n        } \n\n        while (!pq.empty()) {\n            pair<int, int> x = pq.top();\n            nums[x.second] = -x.first;\n            pq.pop();\n        }\n        return nums;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"final-array-state-after-k-multiplication-operations-i","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
